text: Lluna Gallego Segovia (born 14 March 2000) is an Andorran footballer who plays as a defender and has appeared for the Andorra women's national team. ==Career== Gallego has been capped for the Andorra national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Andorran women's footballers Category:Andorra women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders
title: Lluna Gallego
